pr_title: [Enhancement] Align buttons in some Views and add lock mechanism for Programming Assessment and some refactoring

timeline.message: rename file
use same buttons as other exercise types and use resolver for locking (locking is not enabled yet)
add locking functionality to server calls
make it work also for new assessments
try to make locking work for programming exercises
add check and enable lock also for next submission and set result always rated
use same buttons for team assessment and also for scores page
fix issue with router link and naming of button + run spotless
delete not used component

copy the feedbacks during the lock into the new result.
remove import
fix issue with copying the automatic feedback and change save/submit call as it is always ensured to have a manual result in the database
refactor to avoid not needed calls as automatic feedback is already included in manual feedback when locking the assessment
fix cancel assessment and issue with no result string when creating manual result during the lock
removed commented out code and display view submission button in exercise score only when a manual result is available
make sure that route for new assessment is triggered
add info about locklimit when reached
improve error handling for team assessment
Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into enhancement/programming-assessment/align-button-assessment-dashboard
rename to view assessment + add lock limit to 2 for testing
fix server tests
add tests
Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into enhancement/programming-assessment/align-button-assessment-dashboard
fix client tests
Merge branch 'develop' into enhancement/programming-assessment/align-button-assessment-dashboard

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Get a file upload submission of the given exercise that still needs to be assessed and lock the submission to prevent other tutors from receiving and assessing it.
          
          
            
                 * Get a programming exercise submission of the given exercise that still needs to be assessed and lock the submission to prevent other tutors from receiving and assessing it.
timeline.author: kloessst

timeline.bodyText: I'd rename the variable to manualResult if because the statement just looks for the first manual result. I guess this is fine because only one manual result can exist now.
timeline.author: kloessst

timeline.bodyText: Is this call necessary? latestExistingResult should already have an safe submission fetched from the DB.
timeline.author: kloessst
kloessst

timeline.message: small fixes
try to fix issue with hibernate exception, incorporate feedback and improve the check for isFirstAssessment

timeline.bodyText: A bit confusing method name, maybe LockAndGetProgrammingSubmissionWithoutResult makes more sense
timeline.author: TobiasPr

replies.bodyText: Changed to lockAndGetProgramingSubmissionWithoutResultand also accordingly for modeling and file upload exercises.
replies.author: fde312

timeline.bodyText: can we please remove this @Transactional here
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -163,19 +163,20 @@ public long countSubmissionLocks(long courseId) {
      * No manual result means that no user has started an assessment for the corresponding submission yet.
      * For exam exercises we should also remove the test run participations as these should not be graded by the tutors.
      *
-     * @param fileUploadExercise the exercise for which we want to retrieve a submission without manual result
+     * @param exercise the exercise for which we want to retrieve a submission without manual result
      * @param examMode flag to determine if test runs should be removed. This should be set to true for exam exercises
      * @return a submission without any manual result or an empty Optional if no submission without manual result could be found
      */
     @Transactional(readOnly = true)

timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -634,4 +633,42 @@ public ProgrammingSubmission findByIdWithEagerResultAndFeedback(long submissionI
         return programmingSubmissionRepository.findWithEagerResultAssessorFeedbackById(submissionId)
                 .orElseThrow(() -> new EntityNotFoundException("Programming submission with id \"" + submissionId + "\" does not exist"));
     }
+
+    /**
+     * Get a programming submission of the given exercise that still needs to be assessed and lock the submission to prevent other tutors from receiving and assessing it.
+     *
+     * @param exercise the exercise the submission should belong to
+     * @return a locked programming submission that needs an assessment
+     */
+    @Transactional

replies.bodyText: Isn't it possible then, that two tutors aquire the same lock on a submission?
replies.author: kloessst
